name: The Censor
description:
The Censor is a dystopian visual novel. After years spent assimilating into the System, CJ489775 is visited by a ghost from her past and must decide whether to support the System or those who live Outside.

Features

  • 12,000 words, 5 endings
  • Full soundtrack by Li'l Magic, including badass orchestrated supertheme
  • Scene library that was huge pain to set up
  • Rootpro virtual social network to explore for additional backstory
  • Available in English and German
  • Unarchived source code
